snippet: A truck driver was pulled over by Mr. de Blasio’s security detail in Brooklyn on Wednesday after allegedly running a red light in the direction of the mayor, who was about to step into a crosswalk.
abstract: New York City Hall officials say truck driver was pulled over by Mayor Bill de Blasio's security detail after mayor noticed that he had run red light; de Blasio has made traffic safety priority of his administration.
lead_paragraph: A truck driver was pulled over by Mr. de Blasio’s security detail in Brooklyn on Wednesday after allegedly running a red light in the direction of the mayor, who was about to step into a crosswalk.

headline.main: Trucker Cited for Running Light in Mayor Bill de Blasio’s Path
headline.print_headline: Trucker Cited for Running Light in Mayor’s Path
